attributes.action: ban all mps who don't understand science is the study of reality
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The basis of science is repeatable testable experements and logical diduction based on the observations of reality any mp who does not understand this is clearly deluded or insain and I don't want my country run by a bunch of diluded idiots

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
